verses.verse: A Song, a Psalm of David. My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>fixed<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; I will <S%H7891>sing<s%>, <S%H2167>yea<s%>, I will sing praises, even with my <S%H3519>glory<s%>.
Awake <S%H5782><s%>, <S%H5035>psaltery<s%> and <S%H3658>harp<s%>: I myself will <S%H5782>awake<s%> right <S%H7837>early<s%>.
I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah, among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>; And I will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto thee among the <S%H3816>nations<s%>.
For thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> above the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; And thy <S%H571>truth<s%> reacheth unto the <S%H7834>skies<s%>.
Be thou <S%H7311>exalted<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, above the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, And thy <S%H3519>glory<s%> above all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
That thy <S%H3039>beloved<s%> may be <S%H2502>delivered<s%>, <S%H3467>Save<s%> with thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and answer <S%H6030>us<s%>.

God <S%H430><s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in his <S%H6944>holiness<s%>: I will <S%H5937>exult<s%>; I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, and mete <S%H4058>out<s%> the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>.
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is <S%H4519>mine<s%>; Manasseh is <S%H669>mine<s%>; Ephraim also is the <S%H4581>defence<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%>; <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is my <S%H2710>sceptre<s%>.
Moab <S%H4124><s%> is my <S%H7366>washpot<s%>; Upon <S%H123>Edom<s%> will I <S%H7993>cast<s%> my <S%H5275>shoe<s%>; Over <S%H6429>Philistia<s%> will I <S%H7321>shout<s%>.
Who will <S%H2986>bring<s%> me into the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>? Who hath <S%H5148>led<s%> me unto <S%H123>Edom<s%>?
Hast not thou cast us <S%H2186>off<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>? And thou goest not <S%H3318>forth<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, with our <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
Give <S%H3051><s%> us <S%H5833>help<s%> against the <S%H6862>adversary<s%>; For <S%H7723>vain<s%> is the <S%H8668>help<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.
Through <S%H430>God<s%> we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly<s%>: For he it is that will tread <S%H947>down<s%> our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>.
